flawed_nl_solution:
Johnny TV makes 25/100*220=<<25/100*220=880/1>>880/1 more movies than L&J Productions each year.
The total number of movies that Johnny TV makes in a year is 220+880/1=<<220+880/1=1100>>1100
Together, Johnny TV and L&J Productions make 1100+220=<<1100+220=1320>>1320 movies in a year.
In 5 years, the two companies make 1320*5=<<1320*5=6600>>6600 movies.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 55, not 880/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
